description: Complete system overview covering the elder-focused photo management architecture, key components, and integration patterns
Detailed documentation of the memory verification algorithms, including timeline reconstruction, uncertainty handling, and reality checking mechanisms
Comprehensive documentation of family permission models, multi-generational access patterns, and caregiver dashboard data flows
Technical specifications for elder-specific optimizations including cognitive load management, accessibility patterns, and UI/UX requirements
Documentation of system-wide data flows between memory verification, family features, and frontend components, including integration patterns
